title: Charlotte's Gordon Hayward
description:
Charlotte Hornets star Gordon Hayward joins The Woj Pod discuss his return to All-Star form, inside his decision to leave the Celtics, the quality of pandemic basketball, LaMelo Ball, much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
